jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: We are looking for a Frontend Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing and implementing user interface components using React.js and other frontend technologies.
requirements: Strong knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.description: Join our team of backend engineers working on scalable solutions for our cloud products. You'll be working with modern technologies in a fast-paced environment.
requirements: Knowledge of database systems like MongoDB and SQL
Understanding of cloud services (AWS, Azure, or GCP)

jobs.title: UX Designer
jobs.description: We're looking for a talented UX Designer to help create intuitive and engaging user experiences for our products. You'll work closely with product managers and engineers to define and implement innovative solutions.
requirements: Proficiency with design tools like Figma, Sketch

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: Join our data science team to analyze and interpret complex data to help drive business decisions. You'll apply advanced statistical analysis and machine learning techniques.
requirements: Master's or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
Experience with Python, R, and SQL
